createwithdefault.description: Attribute used to tell the cli whether an object can be created withdefaultref and/or default settings.  If this is false, all attributes must be set by user in order for create to be called.

cliname.description: name used in cli to describe bfd

commands.description: holds all related sub command attributes related to this Leaf

prompt.description: what to display on the prompt when the user has entered a command

value.description: this is a trigger to cli that a command needs one of the attribute values contained in the properties commands LeafMemberTemplate

help.default: VTEP instance identifier name. should be defined as either vtep<id#> or <id#> if the later then 'vtep' will be prepended to the <id#> example
